ShoppingShow.Welcome_Messages: Ladies and gentlemen, we're delighted to welcome you back to the Stardew Shopping Show.
ShoppingShow.Item_Listing: Right now, you can seize an exclusive deal on {{currentItem}} for only {{currentItemPrice}} Gold! Don't miss out; be the first to claim this valuable treasure!
ShoppingShow.Successful_Purchase: Thank you for choosing Stardew Shopping Show. Your item will be delivered by tomorrow.
ShoppingShow.Successful_Purchase_Express: Thank you for selecting the Stardew Shopping Show. Your item will be delivered promptly, courtesy of our express service.
ShoppingShow.Mail: Thank you for choosing Stardew Shopping Show. ^Your item is listed below. ^^Best Regards^Stardew Shopping Team
ShoppingShowConfig.IntantDelivery_Descri: Immediately adds the purchased item to the mailbox
ShoppingShowConfig.ResetShow_Description: After x hours, there will be a new show with a different item
